Bugnara.title: Bugnara
Bugnara.byline: Bugnara  is a small mountain village in the Abruzzo region.

Buga.title: Buga
Buga.byline: Buga (full name: Guadalajara de Buga) is an old colonial town (founded 1535) in Valle del Cauca, Colombia.

Bugac.title: Bugac
Bugac.byline: Bugac is a small village in the Great Hungarian Plain, on the sandy soils of the Kiskunság ("Little Cumania") region.

Buguma.title: Buguma
Buguma.byline: Buguma is a town in Rivers State, Nigeria.
